segments.pli: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato sāriputto cittaṃ vase vatteti, no ca sāriputto cittassa vasena vattati.
segments.en: “Mendicants, having seven qualities Sāriputta has mastered his mind and is not mastered by it.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, sāriputto samādhikusalo hoti, samādhissa samāpattikusalo, samādhissa ṭhitikusalo, samādhissa vuṭṭhānakusalo, samādhissa kalyāṇakusalo, samādhissa gocarakusalo, samādhissa abhinīhārakusalo hoti.
segments.en: Sāriputta is skilled at immersion, skilled in entering immersion, skilled in remaining in immersion, skilled in emerging from immersion, skilled in gladdening the mind for immersion, skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion, and skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannāgato sāriputto cittaṃ vase vatteti, no ca sāriputto cittassa vasena vattatī”ti.
segments.en: Having these seven qualities Sāriputta has mastered his mind and is not mastered by it.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, having seven qualities Sāriputta has mastered his mind…

suttaplex.blurb: With seven qualities, Sāriputta became a master of meditation.
